title: Direction of acceleration at max height

content.description: A ball is thrown and follows a parabolic path, as shown above. Air friction is negligible. Point Q is the highest point on the path.
content.question: Which of the following best indicates the direction of the acceleration, if any, of the ball at point Q?

choices.label: An arrow pointing to the bottom-right.
There is no acceleration of the ball at point Q.
